text.p: Precision Drilling Corp said on Monday said it would extend its friendly bid for Kenting Energy Services Inc to May 5.
Precision said it would mail a notice of variation and extension for the Kenting offer around April 23.
The Calgary-based oil drilling firm also said it intended to send a letter to Lynx Energy Services Corp shareholders advising them of its agreement with Kenting over its amended offer.
Lynx shareholders were expected to have the opportunity to tender to offer, providing the proposed Kenting-Lynx merger went ahead "within a reasonable period of time," Precision said.

Precision, which launched a hostile cash-and-stock bid for Kenting in February -- moments before Kenting announced its merger deal with Lynx -- agreed with Kenting last week to an improved C$444 million offer.
